name: Mr Topperson Rescue Under Earth
description:
Mr. Topperson Rescue Under Earth

Mr Topperson is the best tunnel digger in town, he has been required to save some moles

Controls:

  • Move - Arrow keys
  • Mouse - To click buttons lol

Hello,  me and my friends are beginning a course of game development, and since I(MadWallker) participaded in a few game jams before, I decided to introduce the wonders(and stress jk) of what game jams can bring as information about designing and working on a project with a strict deadline. Hope y'all like it!

-by MadWallker, KeyBlase, KooriKage and leomagomes.
